title: Tom Brady reverses course after backlash and now wants Patriots to win Super Bowl

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Tom Brady reverses course after backlash and now wants Patriots to win Super Bowl
sources.description: As the New England Patriots prepare for Sunday’s Super Bowl, Tom Brady has decided he is backing his former team after all. Brady, who won six Super Bowls with the Patriots, came under heavy criticism this week after saying he won’t have a “dog in the fight … may the best team win” when New England take on the Seattle Seahawks in Santa Clara, California, on Sunday. On Friday, Brady reversed course.
